entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of -61,700,000 reported in the network role http://flutterentertainment.com/xbrl/2021/roles/StatementOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 2,500,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://flutterentertainment.com/xbrl/2021/roles/StatementOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : GBP Decimals of OtherReserves : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/635400EG4YIJLJMZJ782/2021-12-31/ESEF/GB/0/635400EG4YIJLJMZJ782-2021-12-31.zip/635400EG4YIJLJMZJ782-2021-12-31/reports/635400EG4YIJLJMZJ782-2021-12-31-T01.xhtml 19109
